text: [Music]
hello I'm sheryn a technical associate
here at the AWS office in Cape Town
today I'll show you how to sell an
Amazon elastic compute Cloud reserved
instance on the reserved instance
Marketplace let's get
started it's important to note that you
must have a US bank account in order to
sell reserved instances on the reserved
instance Marketplace if you have an
active Amazon ec2 reserved instance that
you no longer need you can sell it to
another Amazon ec2 user on the reserved
instance
Marketplace first log into the AWS
Management console and navigate to the
ec2 console from the navigation pane
choose reserved
instances select the reserved instance
you want to sell choose the actions drop
down and then select sell reserved
instance
on the sell reserved instance page
review the details of the reserved
instance you are
selling enter The Upfront price you want
to receive for the remaining
term you can choose to automatically
sell when The Upfront price is met or
you can choose to be notified so you can
manually complete the
sale choose
continue review the details on the S
reserved instant page and if everything
looks correct choose list reserved
instance you'll receive a confirmation
that your reserved instance is being
listed on the reserved instance
Marketplace once your reserved instance
is sold the remaining term will be
transferred to the buyer's account and
you will receive the proceeds from the
sale so now you know how to sell an
Amazon ec2 reserved instance on the
reserved instance
Marketplace thanks for watching and
happy cloud computing from all of us
here at AWS
[Music]
